citation: Proclamation under the Corrections Amendment (Parole Board) Act 2015 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Corrections Amendment (Parole Board) Act 2015

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Corrections Amendment (Parole Board) Act 2015 fix 1 August 2015 as the day on which that Act commences.

22 June 2015

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

DR. VANESSA GOODWIN

Minister for Corrections

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 1 July 2015

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
